means: 长嘴鱼（颚狭长如喙的鱼，如雀鳝等），尖嘴鱼（具有剑状长嘴及上颚的鱼，如旗鱼、枪鱼等）

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在台湾一般通称的"旗鱼"包含旗鱼(billfish)及剑旗鱼(swordfish)两大类之鱼种，在现今之世界鱼类之分类系统中，旗鱼科(Istiophoridae).
TOEFL OG Words 2 Flashcards - Flashcard... ... mackerel n.鲭鱼 billfish n.喙鱼 marlin n.枪鱼.
United Nations Open-ended Informal... ... bigeye tuna 大眼金枪鱼 billfish 长咀鱼 bottom trawls 海底拖网.
billey 比耶, billfish 帆鱼, billfinance 汇票方式的资金融通

list.abs: 金枪鱼类(tunas, bonitas, billfish)指鲭亚目中的鲭科(Scombridae)、旗鱼科 (Istiophoridae)和箭鱼科(Xiphiidae)鱼类,它们分布在热带和温带海域,属于高度洄游鱼类。.

means.word_mean: 1. primitive predaceous North American fish covered with hard scales and having long jaws with needle-like teeth
2. giant warm-water game fish having a prolonged and rounded toothless upper jaw
3. slender long-beaked fish of temperate Atlantic waters
4. elongate European surface-dwelling predacious fishes with long toothed jaws; abundant in coastal waters
